name: SpaceTheme for Steam
author: SpaceEnergy
description:
A modular design with dark colors, which makes Steam look clearer and thus Steam can be enjoyed much better.

! This theme is in alpha/pre alpha phase !
! SteamTheme for Steam has been paused indefinitely !
Currently the theme only supports the title bar, library home page, download bar and download page.

When the time comes for updates, there will be an update every 2 weeks.
